bug.author: SiyangXie
bug.summary: Cannot find file paths when training
bug.description:
I am trying to train a single class detection. I put my images and labels exactly at coco folder like this, but still cannot find paths. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13971749/69344882-1e914800-0cab-11ea-87b3-7152d9be3389.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13971749/69344654-b17db280-0caa-11ea-80dd-6a5e2107bb62.png></denchmark-link>
Desktop (please complete the following information):
Mac OS

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/SiyangXie>@SiyangXie</denchmark-link> you need to point your *.data file to these paths. See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data</denchmark-link>
